0.text: Innate: Thresh's  armor cannot increase through growth (per level).
0.html: Innate: Thresh's  armor cannot increase through growth (per level).

1.text: Innate: Enemy  champions, large  minions and large  monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls, small minions and lesser monsters have a 33.3% chance to drop a Soul.
1.html: Innate: Enemy champions, large minions and large monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls, small minions and lesser monsters have a 33.3% chance to drop a Soul.

2.text: Thresh automatically collects Souls near him or a placed  Dark Passage.
2.html: Thresh automatically collects Souls near him or a placed Dark Passage.

3.text: Soul: For each stack, Thresh gains  1 ability power and  1 bonus armor.
3.html: Soul: For each stack, Thresh gains  1 ability power and  1 bonus armor.

0.text: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming  unable to move or attack while it is in flight.
0.html: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.

1.text: The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal magic damage,  reducing Death Sentence's cooldown by 3 seconds, and  stunning and  revealing them for 1.5 seconds. Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is  slowed by 20% for 1 second.
1.html: The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal magic damage,  reducing Death Sentence's cooldown by 3 seconds, and stunning and revealing them for 1.5 seconds. Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is slowed by 20% for 1 second.

2.text: While the target is  stunned, Thresh tugs twice over 0.8 seconds,  pulling the target a short distance with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a  minion or  monster, Thresh can recast the ability while the target is Shackled, which will cause him to stop tugging.
2.html: While the target is stunned, Thresh tugs twice over 0.8 seconds, pulling the target a short distance with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a minion or monster, Thresh can recast the ability while the target is Shackled, which will cause him to stop tugging.

3.text: Recast - Deathly Leap: Thresh  dashes to the Shackled enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. He can cast  Dark Passage and  Flay during the dash.
3.html: Recast - Deathly Leap: Thresh dashes to the Shackled enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. He can cast Dark Passage and Flay during the dash.

0.text: Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location over 0.5 seconds, which then grants  sight of its surroundings and lasts for 6 seconds while he remains nearby.
0.html: Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location over 0.5 seconds, which then grants sight of its surroundings and lasts for 6 seconds while he remains nearby.

1.text: Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a  shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it,  dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.
1.html: Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.

2.text: An ally cannot select the lantern while  immobilized,  grounded, or  silenced. The lantern will not expire from Thresh moving too far away if he is dashing with  Deathly Leap.
2.html: An ally cannot select the lantern while immobilized, grounded, or silenced. The lantern will not expire from Thresh moving too far away if he is dashing with Deathly Leap.

0.text: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage, with the  AD ratio increasing over 10 seconds without basic attacking enemies.
0.html: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage, with the  AD ratio increasing over 10 seconds without basic attacking enemies.

1.text: Active: Thresh sweeps his chain across the ground in a broad line and a radius around him, starting behind him and towards the target direction. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage,  knocked 200 units in the target direction, and then  slowed for 1 second upon landing.
1.html: Active: Thresh sweeps his chain across the ground in a broad line and a radius around him, starting behind him and towards the target direction. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage, knocked 200 units in the target direction, and then slowed for 1 second upon landing.

0.text: Active: Thresh erects a pentagon of spectral walls around him that each last for 5 seconds. A wall will break upon enemy champion contact, dealing magic damage and  slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Thresh erects a pentagon of spectral walls around him that each last for 5 seconds. A wall will break upon enemy champion contact, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.

1.text: An enemy hit becomes immune to breaking another wall for 1 second after breaking one. Subsequent walls will deal no damage and  slow for only 1 second.
1.html: An enemy hit becomes immune to breaking another wall for 1 second after breaking one. Subsequent walls will deal no damage and slow for only 1 second.

Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is  slowed by 20% for 1 second.
Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a  shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it,  dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+3 attack damage
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Runesteel Spaulders, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Devotion: Grant allied champions within 850 radius a shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – DEVOTION: Grant allied champions within  850 radius a  shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Consecrate: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+250 health
+250 mana
+35 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+200% base health regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a  shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it,  dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.
